results.title: Bhaji on the beach
results.creator_credit: Gurinder Chadha, Nadine Marsh-Edwards and Umbi Films
results.brief_description: Life for 10 Anglo-Indian women from the industrial city of Birmingham is about to take a decidedly interesting turn. They’ve set off on a bus trip to the seaside resort of Blackpool for a “female fun time”. With a mixed bag of ages, attitudes and social classes, it’s going to be nothing short of outrageous when these ladies leave behind the demands of spoiled husbands, children and lovers to encounter a world full of strippers, seducers and several other british unmentionables!
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gurinder Chadha, Nadine Marsh-Edwards and Umbi Films

results.title: Yvonne's perfume = Le Parfum d'Yvonne [Widescreen]
results.creator_credit: Patrice Leconte, Thierry Ganay, M.G. Films, Centre European Cinematographique Rhones-Alpes, Zoulou Films and Lambart Productions
results.brief_description: 1958, a resort hotel on Lake Geneva is the setting for this foray into romance, friendship and decadence. It is at the hotel that Victor meets Dr. Meinthe, a flamboyant homosexual, and Yvonne, a beautiful woman who captures them both. Together, the three of them embark on a summer experience like no other. Cast includes Jean-Pierre Marielle, Hippolyte Girardot and Sandra Majani. In French with English subtitles.

results.title: Le Colonel Chabert
results.creator_credit: Yves Angelo, Jean-Louis Livi, DD Productions and Film Par Film
results.brief_description: Colonel Chabert (Gerard Depardieu) is a decorated soldier who miraculously survives the brutal 1807 Battle of Eylau. So badly injured, it takes the Colonel 10 years to recover and make his way back to Paris. When he returns, he finds himself officially listed as dead. Meanwhile his “widow” (Fanny Ardant) has claimed his fortune and taken a new husband, the politically ambitious Count Ferraud (Andre Dussolier) with whom she has two children. Content with her marriage and social standing, Countess Ferraud refuses to acknowledge the now downtrodden Chabert as her former husband. To regain his name, his fortune, and his wife, Chabert hires the brilliant and ruthless attorney Derville (Fabrice Luchini), while Countess Chabert sets in motion a plan to have him removed from her life once and for all. Adapted from a novel by Honore de Balzac. In French with English sub-titles.

results.title: Dead tired = Grosse fatigue
results.creator_credit: Michel Blanc, Canal+, TF1 Films productions and Gaumont-British Instructional
results.brief_description:
Imitation is the greatest compliment. But for Michel, having an impersonator is the biggest nightmare. Michel Blanc is an international film star who is about to have his life turned upside down. A look-alike is posing as him, making public appearances, hosting autograph signings and living his luxurious live. But his identical also happens to be sleazy, greedy and overly aggressive; and when he starts attacking women, dumping business associates and assaulting fans, the real Michel finds himself chased by the law, shunned by his friends and thrown behind bars! Now the world famous star with a reputation to uphold finds he’s about to be ruined by a man who looks identical and acts even better than he. Michel sets off to locate and eliminate his double with the help of Carole Bouquet. The film is filled with cameo by real showbiz personalities sending themselves up and the excesses of their industry. A comedy with a double twist directed by Michel Blanc, from an idea by Bertrand Blier In French with sub-titles.
Cast includes Roman Polanski

results.title: A French woman = Une femme Francaise
results.creator_credit: Regis Wargnier, Volker Schlondorff, Yves Marmion and UGC Images
results.brief_description: A French Woman ambitiously recreates the historical settings of an unhappy love affair against the backdrop of France’s colonial wars (and subsequent defeats). Jeanne ( Emmanuelle Beart) marries Louis (Daniel Auteuil), a soldier who is soon called to combat in World War II, the first of his long absences for military duty. Feeling suffocated when her husband is away, Jeanne has adulterous affairs. No matter how public her infidelities, Louis always takes her back so that the family life (and bourgeois order) with their children can resume before his next far-off posting. Jeanne’s longest affair is with Mathias (Gabriel Barylli), whom she meets when her husband is stationed in postwar Berlin; Mathias follows her to France. Beart’s intense performance as a woman whose life is dominated by her romantic passions vividly shows the pain of an often unsympathetic and self-obsesessed character. Wargnier’s film is reminiscent of the Douglas Sirk melodramas of the 50’s. In French with English sub-titles.

results.title: The Shooting (S)
results.creator_credit: Monte Hellman, Jack Nicholson and Santa Clara Productions
results.brief_description: A group of bounty hunters make camp in a bleak desert. Returning to camp Willett (Warren Oates) finds out his brother has gotten drunk in town and run down a little boy. Additionally his brother’s partner has gotten shot in the back by an unknown gunman. Coley (Will Hutchins), fearful of what is going on gives Willett his guns. The next day, the two meet a mysterious woman (Millie Perkins) who offers Willett $1,000 to take her to the town of Kingsley. Although this film is relatively unknown, it is attracting a small but strong cult following, and is attracting more reviews each year.

results.title: Hercules returns
results.creator_credit: David Parker, Philip Jaroslow and Philm Productions
results.brief_description: After resigning from their jobs, 2 film company executives (David Argue and Bruce Spence) open a revival theatre. On their grand opening they plan to screen the Italian epic, “Hercules”, the film that closed the theatre down. Their ex-boss exacts revenge by sending them the wrong print; an Italian one with no subtitles. With little or no means for rectifying the situation, they make do with what they have at hand and dub the voices themselves. What eventuates is a dramatic departure from the original version, which becomes set in Climidia, with Hercules a cabaret singer and a supporting cast that includes Labia, Testiculi and Machismo. Developed from the live show, “Double take meets Hercules”, written and directed by Des Mangan. Cast includes David Argue, Bruce Spence, Mary Coustas and Michael Carman.

results.title: The Nightmare before Christmas
results.creator_credit: Henry Selick, Tim Burton, Denise Di Novi and Touchstone Pictures
results.brief_description: This delightfully different animated fantasy opens the door to an intriguing new world - where extraordinary surprises and captivating music await. Journey on an incredible adventure of fantastic sights and sounds with the whimsical characters, Pumpkin Jack, Jack Skellington, and the rag doll, Sally. One day Jack discovers Christmastown - a glittering glory of bright lights and shiny packages. Charmed by its magic, Jack brings back this newfound holiday to his ghoulish friends, triggering an hilarious turn of events. Told through the innovative technique of stop-motion animation is an unparalleled adventure that dazzles the eye and charms the mind. Cast includes Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O’Hara, William Hickey, Glenn Shadix.

results.title: The Merchant of four seasons
results.brief_description: Set in the 1950s this film is based directly on a memory from Fassbinder’s youth. An uncle trying to reenter civilian life after serving in the German army set up in business as a fruit and vegetable vendor, other members of the family not only failed to support him but seemed deliberately to put obstacles in his path. Fassbinder turned this recollection of domestic discord into an unsparing critique of selfishness, snobbery and ad inhumanity in a ‘typical’ German middle-class family.

results.title: Love and other catastrophes
results.creator_credit: Emma-Kate Croghan, Stavros Andonis Efthymiou, Screwball Five and Newvision Films
results.brief_description: A warm and witty screwball comedy about love, fate and other pressing concerns. Mia and Alice have just moved into a warehouse apartment but are still minus a housemate. Danni, Mia’s girlfriend is keen to move in, but Mia fears commitment. Mia is obsessed with her favourite lecturer and becomes embroiled in a bureaucratic nightmare as she pursues him to his new department. Alice, a frustrated perfectionist is looking for the perfect man, but cant find anyone who fits her rigorous criteria. Feeling the need for a change she falls for the most unsuitable man possible, Aria part-time gigolo. Little does she know she has her own secret admirer, Michael a shy medical student who is living in the share house from hell, and wants out! Their search for love transcends the boundaries of the Universtiy and their respective disciplines.
